subject: Order
description_text:
Hi,

I made an order on 10/12/25 and I am yet to receive any sort of update on its current whereabouts. On the website it is showing as unfulfilled. Just curious how long I should be expecting to wait.

Order number- 
#SSN4656

Many Thanks
Curtis
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Curtis McArthur,    We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused. Due to recent high demand, we will arrange an expedited UPS shipment for you, with delivery expected on the 22nd.
